title: Funny Text Jokes: 45 Short & Hilarious Jokes to Send Your Friends

steps.title: What do sea monsters eat?
steps.content: What do sea monsters eat? Fish and ships!

steps.title: What do a tick and the Eiffel tower have in common?
steps.content: What do a tick and the Eiffel tower have in common? They’re both Paris sites. [1] X Research source

steps.title: What did the ocean say to the shore?
steps.content: What did the ocean say to the shore? Nothing, it just waved.

steps.title: When does a joke become a dad joke?
steps.content: When does a joke become a dad joke? When it’s apparent. [2] X Research source

steps.title: What did summer say to spring?
steps.content: What did summer say to spring? I’m going to fall!

steps.title: What did one snowman say to another?
steps.content: What did one snowman say to another? Wait, do you smell carrots?

steps.title: What did the hungry clock do?
steps.content: What did the hungry clock do? It went back 4 seconds.

steps.title: What’s the tallest building in the world? A library, of course. It has so many stories!
steps.content: What’s the tallest building in the world? A library, of course. It has so many stories!

steps.title: Don’t take life too seriously.
steps.content: Don’t take life too seriously. Remember, you will never get out of it alive!

steps.title: I always take life with a grain of salt. And a slice of lemon. And a shot of tequila!
steps.content: I always take life with a grain of salt. And a slice of lemon. And a shot of tequila!

steps.title: I know they say that money talks… ...But all mine says is “Goodbye!”
steps.content: I know they say that money talks… ...But all mine says is “Goodbye!”

steps.title: I used to have a handle on life… ...But then it broke.
steps.content: I used to have a handle on life… ...But then it broke.

steps.title: I tried to catch fog the other day.
steps.content: I tried to catch fog the other day. But I mist.

steps.title: Let’s start telling people their brain is an app.
steps.content: Let’s start telling people their brain is an app. Maybe then they’ll want to use it!

steps.title: I’m reading a book about anti-gravity.
steps.content: I’m reading a book about anti-gravity. It’s literally impossible to put down!

steps.title: What do you call a one-eyed dinosaur?
steps.content: What do you call a one-eyed dinosaur? Thesaurus. [3] X Research source

steps.title: Why can’t you trust a burrito?
steps.content: Why can’t you trust a burrito? They tend to spill the beans.

steps.title: What’s a plant’s favorite drink?
steps.content: What’s a plant’s favorite drink? Root beer!

steps.title: I threw a boomerang a few years ago… ...And now I live in constant fear.
steps.content: I threw a boomerang a few years ago… ...And now I live in constant fear.

steps.title: What did one hat say to another?
steps.content: What did one hat say to another? You wait here; I’ll go on ahead.

steps.title: I get enough exercise just pushing my luck!
steps.content: I get enough exercise just pushing my luck! [4] X Research source

steps.title: Blunt pencils are really pointless.
steps.content: Blunt pencils are really pointless.

steps.title: 6:30 is the best time on a clock, hands down.
steps.content: 6:30 is the best time on a clock, hands down. [5] X Research source

steps.title: Just burned 2,000 calories!
steps.content: Just burned 2,000 calories! That’s the last time I leave brownies in the oven while I nap. [6] X Research source

steps.title: You and I will be friends forever!
steps.content: You and I will be friends forever! Because at this point, you know too much.

steps.title: Thanks for being my best friend.
steps.content: Thanks for being my best friend. And for always going along with my worst ideas, of course!

steps.title: This may be cheesy… ...But you’re legen-dairy!
steps.content: This may be cheesy… ...But you’re legen-dairy!

steps.title: What concert only costs 45 cents?
steps.content: What concert only costs 45 cents? 50 Cent and Nickelback.

steps.title: There are 3 kinds of people in this world.
steps.content: There are 3 kinds of people in this world. Those who can count and those who can’t.

steps.title: What kind of button doesn’t button or unbutton?
steps.content: What kind of button doesn’t button or unbutton? A belly button!

steps.title: I know someone who does a great impression of an owl…
steps.content: I know someone who does a great impression of an owl…

steps.title: I’m a nobody and nobody is perfect… ...Therefore, I must be perfect!
steps.content: I’m a nobody and nobody is perfect… ...Therefore, I must be perfect!

steps.title: Knock knock.
steps.content: Knock knock. Who’s there? Muffin. Muffin who? Muffin in this world can stop us!

steps.title: Knock knock.
steps.content: Knock knock. Who’s there? Ben. Ben who? Ben thinking about you all day!

steps.title: Knock knock.
steps.content: Knock knock. Who’s there? Spell. Spell who? Okay, fine…W-H-O.

steps.title: Is your name Google?
steps.content: Is your name Google? Because you’ve got everything I’m searching for.

steps.title: Are you a keyboard?
steps.content: Are you a keyboard? Because you’re my type!

steps.title: On a scale of 1 to 10, you’re a 9… ...And I’m the 1 you need!
steps.content: On a scale of 1 to 10, you’re a 9… ...And I’m the 1 you need!

steps.title: Roses are red, the world is a mess… ...And worst of all, you’re not answering my texts.
steps.content: Roses are red, the world is a mess… ...And worst of all, you’re not answering my texts.

steps.title: Do you know what my favorite thing in the world is?
steps.content: Do you know what my favorite thing in the world is? The second word of this text!

steps.title: We’ll we’ll we’ll… If it isn’t autocorrect.
steps.content: We’ll we’ll we’ll… If it isn’t autocorrect.

steps.title: Autocorrect has become my worst enema.
steps.content: Autocorrect has become my worst enema.

steps.title: What do you call a bear with no teeth?
steps.content: What do you call a bear with no teeth? A gummy bear.

steps.title: The rotation of the Earth really makes my day.
steps.content: The rotation of the Earth really makes my day.

steps.title: The past, present, and future walk into a bar.
steps.content: The past, present, and future walk into a bar. It got a little tense.
